name: Ecosia
description: An eco-friendly search engine that donates 80% of its surplus revenue to tree planting, powered by renewable energy.
longDescription: Ecosia, launched in 2009 in Berlin, Germany, is a search engine with a mission to combat climate change by funding tree planting with 100% of its profits. Using Bingâ€™s search technology with its own algorithms, Ecosia operates on CO2-neutral servers and has planted over 200 million trees by 2022. It appeals to environmentally conscious users and has partnered with Qwant to challenge Google in Europe. Available as a browser extension and mobile app, Ecosia combines sustainability with a privacy-respecting approach.
